string.name: Ques1
string.b: 1. What makes this application better from others in the Market?

string.name: Ques2
string.b: 2. How can I Contribute to make this app better ?

string.name: Ques3
string.b: 3. Why do i get weird numbers with \'E\' between them ?

string.name: Ques4
string.b: 4. I don\'t like the Advertisement, and i don\'t have money also. Is there any Good News for me ?

string.name: Ques5
string.b: 5. I think that "blah..blah" Opertion is missing ?

string.name: Ques6
string.b: 6. How can i contact You apart from github and mails ?

string.name: Ques8
string.b: 8. Why Can\'t I save a Matrix Result involving Exponents ?

string.name: Ques9
string.b: 9. Is there any Hope to get Support for Imaginary Numbers ?

string.name: Ques10
string.b: 10. I just Loved your Work, How can i Support You ?

resources.string: This is a Open Source Project, Hence Unique in itself.

The Application is Open Source and the best thing about a OpenSource Projects is that, Everyone can contribute to make it better. Here is my Repository https://www.github.com/coder3101 I invite you to help me making it better for You.

The Numbers involving \'E\' are not weird but its actually another way of representing bigger numbers in Scientific Notation. For Example if Your result is something like \"1.234568245E14\", it means 1.234568245 x 10^14.

Those Advertisements may annoy you, but they are a Source of Earning for me. Fortuntely, You can still have the Paid Version of the Application for free, but since nothing is actually free so you will have to do something, you will have to compile the complete application by your ownself, Clone the Project and cook it. Please Do not share your cooked Applications with others, let them compile their own. Please Read the License before doing this.

I Included all the Operations which i know (still in Class 12 didn\'t studied more than this). If You think that Some Operations are Missing, Please Let me Know. I will try my best to include them in next versions of the app. (Yeah.. I will also get the opportunity to learn new Operations)
There are many ways to contact me, like you can reach to me on facebook here https://www.facebook.com/coder3101
Hey, its my birthday 31 January. Just a new way to let the World know "I was born on this date".

The Matrix Result involving Exponents can\'t be saved as a new Variable because, The Highest number of digit which a Cell in the Matrix can hold is 999999. It can hold upto 99999999, if "Extra Small Font" is allowed in Settings.

I am currently working on to bring it. But for that it needs a different keyboard etc, so it may take some time but sooner or later it will be added. Also i am Planning to add Support Trigonometric Ratios.
I don\'t ask for Donations. I am Happy with my Work, if you really want to support me. Share my work
